content.prompt: Using social media, individuals are increasingly able to communicate their political views to a wide audience. However, some messages over social media have led to certain individuals being arrested for making credible threats. This issue is most related to which of the following cases?

choices.label: Engel v. Vitale (1962)
United States v. Lopez (1995)
Tinker v. Des Moines Independent School District (1969)
Schenck v. United States (1919)

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how a required Supreme Court case relates to a relevant political principle, institution, process, policy, or behavior.
